answers.answer: There could be a lot of things causing you to lose weight.  Is this a thyroid related question?Hyperthyroidism can cause weight loss; you need to get tested.  Ask for TSH, Free T3 and Free T4 to begin with.  Also would be good to get tested for diabetes, which can also cause weight loss.

question: i am getting lean day by day.my weight is 64 height is 165 cm .what would be the reason?
title: lean
